channel.title: Fsck on warrick.io

item.title: fsck on startup
item.description: Easiest way I’ve seen to force fsck on the next boot: sudo touch /forcefsck That easy, thanks cyberciti.biz. http://www.cyberciti.biz/faq/linux-force-fsck-on-the-next-reboot-or-boot-sequence/
